sourcesContent: import { Component } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-root', templateUrl: './app.component.html', styleUrls: ['./app.component.css'] }) export class AppComponent { title = 'soundmachine-web-app'; constructor(){} allSounds: string[] = [ "thumbs-up", "heart", "laughing", "surprised", "unhappy", "applause", "raised-hand" ]; }
